name: FlyingThroughSpcae
description:
--FLYING THROUGH SPACE--

w - move up
s - move down
a - move left
d - move right
"space" - shoot

You play as a blue spaceship. After starting the game, 5 opponents are created and there will always be 5 opponents on the field. You get one point for every enemy you kill. If the player is hit by an enemy shot, he loses lives, if the lives drop to 0, the game is over. The aim of the game is to collect as many points as possible. --Have fun-

This is a game I created this year in school in our computer sience course, so dont expect to much, there is no game sound because you cant hear anything in space, haha.

!!!!!Close the Java JDK program in you taskmanager after closing the game!!!!!!!!
